translations: <非正式>大规模交易，巨额交易

sentences.sentence: Pfizer spokeswoman Joan Campion says the company always said it would remain open and doesn't consider Wyeth a traditional "megadeal" because it's not all about one blockbuster.
sentences.translation: 辉瑞发言人Joan Campion说公司应该承诺保持信息公开以及并不认为惠氏是一个传统的“巨额交易”案，因为它的潜在风险不会太大。
